step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You're doing great! Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Excellent! Visualize fluid moving to your chest as you inhale and tighten your muscles.
Perfect exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe out.
Great start to your second set! Sit or stand comfortably and place your hands on your abdomen.
You're doing well. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Fantastic! Keep visualizing fluid moving to your chest as you inhale and tighten.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out as you complete the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body and visualizing fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale through your mouth, relaxing and visualizing pushing fluid out. This helps stimulate lymphatic drainage.
